column5: Hey All  Here's the Latest---hot off da easel  Figure someone will ask---why the ciggy??--not sure  May be soon time to do another fishin one---before ya'll try "N" lock a brother up  Called it "2012"  24 x 36 again
I think the cig is great symbolism with the angel and I ABSOLUTELY love the this work of art!!!!!!!!!!  vance
I'm a fan.  I really like this one.
Bri, Vance and Harrison  You guys are too kind
Bush, this is the best one you have painted in my opinion... I'm really diggin' this one, fantastic job!  The fly fisherman casting in a close second
I wasnt sure if it was a cig or not.When I first seen it,I said thats a cig,I said no cant be,but looked close and it was and it,s cool.
I think that's a great piece of work! Nice job.
I love the symbolism.   :clapping:   Says to me that we run into angels all the time.  Recognizing them is the hard part.
Excellent work Bud !!! Great detail.  But why the smoke ........cause i know, no one else will ask
Even angles, have a bad habit.
ive heard of stone angels, never stoned angels
Differant i can be , what does the cig symbolize  , or like all good art thats up to me right ?
Thanks again all  I'm hopin in the next life we can have a smoke and sit around the fire---without the guilt of it being bad for you.  Yeah ex-smoker for many years  Thanks again
I love it, its very dark!!!!  Great job
the very first thing that popped into my head when looking at it was this.   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4aj_vABphAo   very cool.
that's awesome!

looks like he is contemplating an explanation to the BIG GUY and is having a smoke whilst fabricating his story....or just got repremanded for something  i really enjoyed ALL of your other works but im really diggin this NEW perception of your last few works....totally awesome !!!!
Thanks a bunch again all  Yes Twocoda--the space ones were real fun to do as well
Bush: I dig it bro...
Thanks C4C
